Reviews.Title: Great camera but...
Reviews.Author: Mark D. Serbin
Reviews.Content: The Canon Rebel EOS T4i bundle was great except for one small detail and that detail kept it from getting 5 stars. The Slave Flash does not work and the seller wants nothing to do with fixing the problem. I was referred to Vivitar.The T4i takes beautiful pictures, is somewhat easy to use and does not require a course in DSLR camera use to master. Just go out, use it, play with the settings and you'll be a master of it in no time.The Canon EOS Rebel T4i is a great compact DSLR and I would make the purchase all over again.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: V Taylor
Reviews.Content: This was worth every penny spent.  The kit is awesome.  I love the camera and would certainly recommend it for anyone looking to start taking excellent photos

Reviews.Title: Awesone!!! Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Squirrel
Reviews.Content: Was what I expected but the telephoto lense was on backorder but received in a timely manner.  Very happy customer!!!  Enjoying life once again behind a lense.

Reviews.Title: My first digital slr
Reviews.Author: William E. Ash
Reviews.Content: I love the camera. This is my frist Canon and my first digital EOS buying lenses is getting pricy, but it is what it is.If I was going to do it over I would have bought just the body and not the kit lenses and would have bought the L serieslenses instead. The kit lenses work fine, but L series are just a few steps better.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous package!
Reviews.Author: Runner Girl
Reviews.Content: This is a fabulous package!  Each item comes in it's original manufacturer's packaging.  No need to run to the store to pick up UV filters, an extra battery or a telephoto lens because everything is included!  Just unpack and start taking pictures. The only item that I feel is inferior is the camera bag but everything else is great!  I highly recommend this package because you get a LOT for your money!

Reviews.Title: Nice System!
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM HOLMES JR
Reviews.Content: It works!Now what else need be said.  If it did not work then I would have more to say!

Reviews.Title: Oh Yeah
Reviews.Author: Umpire
Reviews.Content: This camera is unbelieveable . I have taken action shots of grandson playing bb and all in focus. The shutter is amazing. No more waiting for the processor to finish and missing other great shots. This package is a deal beating the shopping networks bad, let alone area stores. Everything arrived in good shape and bundle was as shown. I really got my moneies worth.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dawn L. Reed "Dawn Reed"
Reviews.Content: This camera is by far, the neatest camera. I can't believe how fast the continuous pictures are! I love that when you turn it on there is no wait time for the camera to "warm up"! It was ready when I touched it! Incredible! All the gadgets and gizmo's this package has just makes the this an unbelievable deal!

Reviews.Title: Canon t4i
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Everything shipped.  Cannot use it yet as it is a gift.  Everything arrived as stated but did get a different flash from a different manufacturer that was listed.  Everything else as described.  Very fast shipping.  I dont give out 5 stars unless everything is perfect and also I haven't tried it yet.

Reviews.Title: Not quite what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Arthur Bloom
Reviews.Content: Too much fluff. Not enough substance. I should have picked a better bundle with better lenses. Now I have to go out and buy what I really want
